identity.mission: Create a 'Control Room' trading interface that blends professional financial density with futuristic AI aesthetics. Avoid generic SaaS looks; aim for a Bloomberg Terminal meets Cyberpunk 2077 vibe.
principles: Density: High data density, low visual noise
Contrast: Neon signals against deep void backgrounds
Motion: Smooth, real-time data updates without jitter

headings.usage: Page titles, major section headers, modal titles

mono.usage: Stock prices, model metrics (accuracy/loss), logs, code snippets

rules: Numbers in dashboards MUST use tabular-nums (font-variant-numeric: tabular-nums) to prevent jitter

strategies: Dashboard: Dense grid (grid-cols-12). Charts span 8-12 cols. Metrics span 2-4 cols.
Training View: Split view. Left (Config/Logs) 30%, Right (Real-time Charts) 70%.
Backtesting: 'TradingView' style. Main chart takes 80% height. Bottom panel for trade list.

customization.cards: No shadow, 1px border (border-white/10), sharp or sm radius (rounded-sm)
customization.buttons: Sharp edges or slight radius (rounded-md). Primary buttons use 'glow' effect on hover.
customization.inputs: Flat, dark background (bg-white/5), focus ring color primary
customization.tables: Compact density. Row hover effects (bg-white/5). Monospace font for all data cells.

charts.style: Minimalist. Remove grid lines or make them very subtle (stroke='#333'). Use gradients for area charts.

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-md and bg-black/50 for sticky headers and floating panels.
visual_enhancers.borders: Use 'Grid Borders' strategy: visible separators between dashboard widgets.
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on the main background to reduce banding and add 'film' quality.

images.description: Abstract blue/black squares - Good for 'Empty State' or 'Loading' backgrounds
Glowing AI Head - Use for 'Model Training' active state or welcome screen
Light trails - Use for 'Backtesting' running state

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
